ComicInfo.Title: The World is Lost!
ComicInfo.Summary: The World is Lost!: Odin, possessed by Infinity, attacks Thor. Thor returns to Asgard, where Loki and Karnilla remove the spell from the Warriors Three.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:23:35. [Issue ID 24176]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Heimdall,Sif,Cosgrave,Odin,Odin's Vizier,Karnilla,The Silent One (flashback),Balder,Infinity,Fandral,Hela (flashback),Loki,Don Blake,The Guardian (flashback),Warriors Three [Hogun,Thor,Volstagg]
